entity.name: Nikki Haley
entity.description: US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley

text: @NikkiHaley Under you, South Carolina took $7.87 for every $1 it sent to Washington.  My state #NJ gets $0.72.  So, from the #COVID19 hot zone, spare me the sanctimony of road testing your 2024 platform on our backs.
